posts.title: Site Update: New Look, AI Transparency, and What's Next
posts.description: A site refresh with a new design direction, a note on removing the annotations section, and a commitment to transparency about AI use in building this website.

posts.title: Security on a Budget: Essential Tools and Practices
posts.description: Learn practical security measures that don't require enterprise budgets, from zero trust principles to identifying AI deepfakes and free tools that can protect your digital life.

posts.title: Why Technology Is More Affordable Than Ever
posts.description: An analysis of how web hosting costs have plummeted over the decades, making technology infrastructure more accessible to everyone. This post examines the economic factors that have democratized tech and why it matters for individual creators and small organizations.

posts.title: Launching My Personal Website
posts.description: Today marks an exciting milestone. I have finally launched my personal website! I'm sharing my journey of creating affordable technology solutions without enterprise-level budgets, challenging common assumptions about cost and expertise requirements.
